text: Hi everyone, How do you ensure code quality and unified code style over your codebase? is there any linting or static code analysis tool that has a plugin for popular editors?

elements.text: Hi everyone, How do you ensure code quality and unified code style over your codebase? is there any linting or static code analysis tool that has a plugin for popular editors?

text:
Actually, I'm looking for a tool that tells me about linting issues like unused vars and unreachable codes. I found this: <https://github.com/tonyhffong/Lint.jl>, but it is not maintained anymore.

I'm currently using JuliaFormatter for formatting, but I was curious to find out is there any linting tool out there which is actively maintained?
